name: Nick Kyle
offering: Content Marketing, Copywriting, Email List Building, Email Marketing Training, Email Newsletters to Advertise
what_you_do: I'm an email list manager and deliverability expert from Vancouver Canada. I work with businesses to revitalize or revive their underperforming or dead email lists and turn them into consistent sources of revenue.
business_focus: Helping businesses revitalize and revive their email lists.
